Installing NetApp pluginÂ¶

To install the Cinder Netapp plugin, follow these steps:

  1. Download it from the Fuel Plugins Catalog.

  2. Copy the plugin’s RPM to the Fuel Master node (if you don’t have the Fuel Master node, please see the official Mirantis OpenStack documentation):

    [root@home ~]# scp cinder_netapp-4.0-4.0.0-1.noarch.rpm root@fuel-master:/tmp

  3. Log into Fuel Master node and install the plugin using the Fuel CLI:

    [root@fuel-master ~]# fuel plugins --install cinder_netapp-4.0-4.0.0-1.noarch.rpm

  4. Verify that the plugin is installed correctly:

    [root@fuel-master ~]# fuel plugins
id | name          | version | package_version
---|---------------|---------|----------------
1  | cinder_netapp | 4.0.0   | 4.0.0
